competitiveOpportunityKeywords.title: Screpesi's Sandwich Shop - Sandwiches, Restaurants, Catering

opportunities: Competitors rank higher for delivery keywords

reviews.text: Ordered two sandwiches, mid afternoon on a Saturday. Service was great and the sandwiches were good, bread/rolls are from Liscio's Bakery (Sicklerville, NJ). It's pretty simple inside and out, if they didn't have the sign out front I may have missed it.

Excellent. Great service .The sandwiches were great. We had an Italian and turkey sub.  It's tough to find a hard and soft roll anymore. Everything was fresh, and the two young ladies were so nice to deal with.  We will definitely be back. I want to add ,The guys that work there are equally as nice to deal with. They are all consistent on the making of the sandwiches.
My fiance googled sandwich shop on our way home from Lancaster.  It did not disappoint.   Fresh bread filled with meats & friendly owner.  Will definitely be back next time we drive through.

The regular sandwiches look amazing,  but I ordered a meatball sub, which took 5 minutes. When I got home, the meatballs were cold in the middle. Obviously, they had been in a microwave.  Bread was tasty.

Was driving through looking for great Italian subs and cheesesteak. So happy we decided on Screpesi‚Äôs! The flavors were incredible with fresh ingredients.  All the girls working there were helpful answering all our questions so we could get exactly what we were hungry for. Anyone giving this business less that 5 stars‚Ä¶ shame on you. Keep up the great work Screpesi‚Äôs and thank you for the delectable sandwiches.

recentReviews.text: Very good sandwiches. Homemade rolls. I'd recommend the homemade recipe meatball sandwich or the ham.
It‚Äôs been around since I was a child. Really like people and food.
Best Italian hoagie I've ever had! Will be coming back and bringing friends!

detailedReviews.author: Shawn
detailedReviews.text: Very good sandwiches. Homemade rolls. I'd recommend the homemade recipe meatball sandwich or the ham.

detailedReviews.author: Darshon Rivera
detailedReviews.text: It‚Äôs been around since I was a child. Really like people and food.

detailedReviews.author: Popo Eight
detailedReviews.text: Best Italians in Berks!!!!

detailedReviews.author: Natasha Mohn
detailedReviews.text: Best Italian hoagie I've ever had! Will be coming back and bringing friends!

detailedReviews.author: Mack Garvin
detailedReviews.text: They are always busy which means good food is being offered.

detailedReviews.author: Robin Aletras
detailedReviews.text: They are so nice and friendly. Sandwiches are delicious.

detailedReviews.author: Dave G
detailedReviews.text: Best sandwiches around!

detailedReviews.author: Trey Halo
detailedReviews.text: We just picked up multiple meatball sandwiches.  We were told it would be twenty minutes and of course no one was in the store when we arrived.  Our sandwiches were completely cold almost like they were in a refrigerator when we got home.  Very disappointing.

detailedReviews.author: Brenda Jacobs
detailedReviews.text: Called for over 20 minutes for some very unpleasant person to answer phone, placed order, picked up order, went home to find the wrong item. Tried calling back many times, no one answered this time, drove all the way back to the sandwich shop again. Screpsies used to be a nice place, this time not so nice, not going back ever!

detailedReviews.author: Daniel Cullen
detailedReviews.text: Love this place....best sandwy üòã

detailedReviews.author: Dawn Buck
detailedReviews.text: There needs to be an Adult in charge.

detailedReviews.author: Jan Pasko
detailedReviews.text: Amazing place!! Great food & staff!  Fresh everything!

detailedReviews.author: Tim
detailedReviews.text: Ordered two sandwiches, mid afternoon on a Saturday. Service was great and the sandwiches were good, bread/rolls are from Liscio's Bakery (Sicklerville, NJ). It's pretty simple inside and out, if they didn't have the sign out front I may have missed it.

detailedReviews.author: chris parsons
detailedReviews.text: Food is always good here. Best sandwiches ever!!!! Been coming here forever...and will always continue too....

detailedReviews.author: Christie Kolar-Smith
detailedReviews.text: Screpsi's is always amazing! They were my first and only thought when I was planning a memorial for my dear friend. They did a phenomenal job like always!!!

detailedReviews.author: Antonio Crespo
detailedReviews.text: Professional

detailedReviews.author: john dominicis
detailedReviews.text: Been gettin cheese steaks there for 60+ years - NEVER a bad experience!!!!

detailedReviews.author: Ralph Flammer
detailedReviews.text: This is the best place to buy sandwiches in the city of Reading

detailedReviews.author: Charles Gray
detailedReviews.text: No atmosphere, it's a sandwich shop! Best ham & cheese sandwich!

detailedReviews.author: Michael Kissinger
detailedReviews.text: Excellent. Great service .The sandwiches were great. We had an Italian and turkey sub.  It's tough to find a hard and soft roll anymore. Everything was fresh, and the two young ladies were so nice to deal with.  We will definitely be back. I want to add ,The guys that work there are equally as nice to deal with. They are all consistent on the making of the sandwiches.

detailedReviews.author: Rick Olmos
detailedReviews.text: The regular sandwiches look amazing,  but I ordered a meatball sub, which took 5 minutes. When I got home, the meatballs were cold in the middle. Obviously, they had been in a microwave.  Bread was tasty.

detailedReviews.author: RocheTV RocheTV
detailedReviews.text: Usually 5 star for ham on roll. Today only a 2 star. .. because it's Sunday? Been coming here 50 years üòû

detailedReviews.author: Kimberly Link
detailedReviews.text: We are from Indiana and have family that live in the Reading area. Everytime we come out to visit we always have to sandwiches back with us. Staff are very friendly, goes above and beyond to package the sandwiches for the ride back home to Indiana. Definitely will always be back on our trips.

detailedReviews.author: Melissa DeAngelo
detailedReviews.text: I've been going there since I was a small child with my mom and step-dad. I've always loved their food!!

detailedReviews.author: Antionette Scuteri
detailedReviews.text: I got the Italian sub after not having one in 10 plus years this was delicious!!!

detailedReviews.author: akopi09
detailedReviews.text: Whenever my wife and I come back home to visit family, Screpesi‚Äôs is our first and last stop!

detailedReviews.author: Nicole Polley
detailedReviews.text: My fiance googled sandwich shop on our way home from Lancaster.  It did not disappoint.   Fresh bread filled with meats & friendly owner.  Will definitely be back next time we drive through.

detailedReviews.author: Lori Dumm
detailedReviews.text:
All So Awesome They Stuff The Meat And Extra Yummy
Parking On the Hill N Front .

detailedReviews.author: Linda Dawson
detailedReviews.text: Great Italian sandwiches!

detailedReviews.author: Antwine Rainey
detailedReviews.text: First time here I like the shop as soon as I walked in I was greeted pleastly the place was neat and clean the sandwiches was made fresh staff prepared it with gloves on over all nice atmosphere and good service the sandwich was delicious me and my wife enjoyed it üòã definitely recommend

detailedReviews.author: Doug Walton
detailedReviews.text: Best sandwich shop in the area!

detailedReviews.author: Gregory Alesin
detailedReviews.text:
Outstanding,delicious each&Everytime.
Also great courteous workers go above&beyond to satisfy Everytime
Thankyou everyone
We appreciate you
Michelle Alesin üíì

detailedReviews.author: Jeffrey Pauley
detailedReviews.text: Everyone was nice and friendly.

detailedReviews.author: Tina Whitman
detailedReviews.text: Best ham on roll around.

detailedReviews.author: Karen Lutz
detailedReviews.text: Ordered our sandwiches online and they were ready at the exact time they stated.  The sandwiches were fresh and delicious.  Their tuna hoagies are the best!

detailedReviews.author: Barbara Waltman
detailedReviews.text: My favorite Italian sandwich in the Reading area.

detailedReviews.author: Debra Royles
detailedReviews.text: The BEST sandwiches in town!!! My favorites are ham-on-roll, tuna and meatball. The salads are also fabulous!

detailedReviews.author: Danny Ziolkowski
detailedReviews.text: Just purchased two large sandwiches and a bag of chips .Those ATV rolls can‚Äôt be beat. Fresh ingredients in sandwiches. They made the sandwiches like I requested them. Staff was friendly and polite. Shop was clean and neat

detailedReviews.author: mitch wasik
detailedReviews.text: Just a simple sandwich shop with the most delicious Italian sub!

detailedReviews.author: eliezer acevedo
detailedReviews.text: Great cold sandwiches for miles awesome service

detailedReviews.author: James Mulay Jr
detailedReviews.text: Hoagie was top notch

detailedReviews.author: ken fair
detailedReviews.text: The best sandwiches period ! Staff is very friendly

detailedReviews.author: Joelle Dennis
detailedReviews.text: Service is always outstanding. There‚Äôs always a lot of meat on their sandwiches. Everything is fresh. And their prices are also amazing. Highly recommend !

detailedReviews.author: elf man
detailedReviews.text:
Best Ham on Roll in the area
Fast Service Friendly Atmosphere

detailedReviews.author: alina paula
detailedReviews.text: Been eating here for years, customer serviceee and food is amazing

detailedReviews.author: Guppy Girl (GUPPY)
detailedReviews.text: Usually get a tuna salad but decided to get an Italian this time and IT was kinda a letdown...I've never had someone dump so much oil on my sandwhich!! It was barely edible by the time I got home because the roll was just mush...and the ends of tomato's do not belong in sandwhiches...plus a banana pepper stem...guess it just wasn't my day...because usually they are very good...

detailedReviews.author: Dean Santana
detailedReviews.text: They know how to make an Italian sandwich

detailedReviews.author: Shari Schoennagel
detailedReviews.text: We always stop for sandwiches when we are in the area! (We live in Vermont now) and the food never disappoints!! Highly recommend!

detailedReviews.author: Carla Raimo
detailedReviews.text: Portions are great for the price. Foods always amazing!!

detailedReviews.author: Beth Petricoin
detailedReviews.text: Meatball subs taste like they were made by an Italian grandmother. Cold subs are the best in town. Place is spotless and great service!

detailedReviews.author: Robyn Mengel
detailedReviews.text: Best little sandwich shop in Reading!!

detailedReviews.author: Christa Schwartz
detailedReviews.text: Great little shop serving up tasty subs.  Friendly people

detailedReviews.author: Carol Whitcraft
detailedReviews.text:
Started coming to your sandwich shop when I was 5 years old with my Grandma, I am now 73. We would shop in downtown Reading and on our way home would always stop for sandwiches for the whole family. Since then I have been making trips from time  to time from Lititz. I‚Äôve sent many customers to your shop
over the years including my Son and his family. As far as I‚Äôm concerned you have the best sandwiches I‚Äôve ever eaten and am very addicted to your Ham-on-rolls. One more thing, my Son lives in Lancaster close to Millersville and he makes the trip as well. Just wanted to let you folks know we love your sandwiches!! Please never close!!!

detailedReviews.author: R. Bruce Pollock
detailedReviews.text: Fantastic sandwiches!  Only wish they sold homemade soup.

detailedReviews.author: Joanie Sellari
detailedReviews.text: As putting my text. All 3 staff worked together.  My steak stayed hot as they offered to keep it separate from my cold food. They were very polite & friendly. So I decided to tip all 3. As they worked synergistically to complete my order. I was delighted to have a20% coupon so I got tomorrows lunch. Thanks team

detailedReviews.author: Teague Jones
detailedReviews.text: Very good food and good people

detailedReviews.author: Larry Hanna
detailedReviews.text: Best Italian subs/hoagie in Berks!   Wife likes the Italian salads (no carbs) as well...

detailedReviews.author: BLACKGANG BOSS
detailedReviews.text: Best subs hoagies  whatever u wanna call it ! Stamped n approved‚úîÔ∏è

detailedReviews.author: Darren Anastasio
detailedReviews.text: Ordered ahead of time. Food was ready. Staff was friendly. A 20% discount was applied to large order. In and out in 5 minutes.

detailedReviews.author: lynn travillion-reyes
detailedReviews.text: Good food

detailedReviews.author: Donald J Hillbish
detailedReviews.text: Seems like sandwiches are not built like they used to be.

detailedReviews.author: Cherelle Haag
detailedReviews.text: I absolutely love their sandwiches! Everything is fresh and tastes so good! One of the best sandwich shops.

detailedReviews.author: Heidi Michael
detailedReviews.text: They make the absolute best Italian Sub! Always fresh meat, veggies and rolls. Great prices too! I highly recommend there subs! Also their staff is very friendly has well. We frequent the location located at route 568 .

detailedReviews.author: Dany Lopez
detailedReviews.text: This people sent me a tuna sandwich with tomato‚Äôs  and lettuce after I told them all I wanted was cheese onions and the tuna  on my breed only I then called them to get this fixed they hung up on me I called from a different phone and they told me they were close when online it showed that they close at 8 and it was only 520 not recommended at all

detailedReviews.author: 2 Slick4u
detailedReviews.text: We've been coming here almost 50 years and today was the worst sandwiches I've ever gotten from Screpesi's, also they don't know what the word lite means. Our ham on roll with lite onions was actually an onion sandwich with very little ham. The same the Italians. We asked for lite peppers but had to scrape off a saturated roll and it was still too much and this sandwich also didn't have the amount of meat that the sandwich usually does. All we could taste was peppers and lettuce. Everytime we order from here, it's a continuous decline.

detailedReviews.author: Jody Schwambach
detailedReviews.text: My favorite Italian sandwich in Berks County, always has been! Top quality ingredients along with great customer service makes it the go to place for lunch or dinner!

detailedReviews.author: Rebecca C
detailedReviews.text: Only sandwiches, frozen Mac & cheese/stewed tomatoes, potato chips, and various drinks are available. I ordered a meatball sandwich, an Italian, and asked if they had cheese steak hoagies. I was told yes, so I asked for provolone cheese on the steak and meatball and chose the roll types (soft/hard toasted or not). I should have opened the sandwiches to check them there before I left but didn't want them to get cold or messy and ASSUMED that my order was correct. Unfortunately, it wasn't. My cheese steak hoagie was just meat, a few onions, and sauce on the roll. IF there was cheese, I couldn't tell. I live 45 minutes away and was so excited to try these great sandwiches I've been hearing about for years. Upon finding my sandwich bare, I called the establishment and asked again if they make cheese steak hoagies, thinking maybe I misunderstood. I was told that they do make them so I explained what had happened to me, thinking maybe they would offer a discount or something but the response was, "yeah, we do make them". It IS a small, privately owned business so I understand that mistakes are made and it's expensive to remake a sandwich that was made incorrectly, for free, but I live too far away to want to return and order it again, for full price!

detailedReviews.author: Troy R
detailedReviews.text: I have been going to this place for a great sub since 1978. This is and will always be an Icon to the Reading area.

detailedReviews.author: Harvey Brendle
detailedReviews.text: Friendly service,  I have been coming here for years always Great tasting sandwiches

detailedReviews.author: Shelly Clouser
detailedReviews.text: We use to love going there,the sandwiches use to be great and serve use to be great ,can I say wow the service with  the  new girls they were rude and pushy ,, the food and quality  of it has really declined , obviously things have changed for cheaper products and larger price tag. Won't be back üòå

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 4.7/5 rating across 100 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: Customers rave about the homemade rolls and sandwiches, particularly the meatball and ham options, highlighting the quality and uniqueness of the offerings. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The friendly and welcoming staff consistently enhance the dining experience, making customers feel valued and encouraging repeat visits. - review management can highlight this positive aspect

The restaurant's long-standing presence and popularity, as indicated by its busy nature and loyal customer base, underscore its reputation for consistently good food. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this
improvementOpportunities: Negative reviews and reputation issues due to incorrect orders and poor customer service - review management can address this concern
Long wait times and cold food complaints - Boostly marketing services can improve this
Poor online visibility and lack of clear signage - SEO services can solve this visibility issue
